topic.title: This is not related to anything, but how was Quebec able to get their own forum?
topic.body: It's super quiet there. I'm just curious. Was there a significant contributor to this project in Quebec?

1_1LESBhM9ResjKhCCNhgbNDVFKcfdQractA.body:
> [luoqj](#comment_2_13afN5ihVBmgacUPzMeM9AVjcdEYDve8X6): 看不懂就不看呗，非得在乎他们的感受？

发广告的哪来这么多事

I visit this post everyday to know exactly who I need to mute. 
Arrogant words breed chaos. 
Ignorance is what keeps us away from freedom. 
此贴为拉黑指南，诸君请充分利用。

> [hook54321](#comment_7_1Jk6iv2QXUgZo4Y4P5ZUKe7SrpMnGs5unL): How does visiting this post tell you who you need to mute?

mute the trolls

1_1KjKGbXe5KwQkmHdtsyhp1TzRieGu3wPBw.body:
> [tofuchigga](#comment_1_1VjSLTXVnAY1Crt7ZdaM2WiKKMbD15vyF): ain't that the truth> sternezelt: china ruled by emperor XI

Emperor was/is only a symbol. Society is not run by any individual, but by those who benefit most from the current policy. Even when the emperor himself tries to change something, these people will bark, oh they will.

1_1M78zG4cdm2osFEpXApCHxh6bu936kgte6.body: You mean a game that requires stable connection?

> [eelelo](#comment_13_1M78zG4cdm2osFEpXApCHxh6bu936kgte6): To answer your question: not necessarily.

A Flappy Bird game would definately work. I was thinking more of a online game where ping matters.

1_16N9gdSwDGP1htRPyWcNd3psxAsDF5BhkX.body:
请大家不要搭理垃圾信息，直接拉黑即可
Please just mute posts like this.

1_1MbML7iwm3KXWRS16y3jkfCrXuUXDD6pd7.body: Meanwhile, I use my critical thinking skill and make informed decision for myself. Smells like placebo.

> [naturalhealth](#comment_2_1MbML7iwm3KXWRS16y3jkfCrXuUXDD6pd7): To most of us, It's amazing and beyond common sense.Chairman Mao said that practice is the only criterion for testing truth. Try.

Try? Do you have data for a long-term double-blind medical trial on a large randomized sample population. My singular testimony gets you nowhere.

> [naturalhealth](#comment_5_1MbML7iwm3KXWRS16y3jkfCrXuUXDD6pd7): Sorry, "try" is a bit of a misnomer. There are many cases on DuoSuccess BBS https://www.duosuccess.com/bbs If you don't understand Chinese,  here are some cases in English : http://momshappinesslife.blogspot.com

Haha, as if you would show me real results. I'm using English here simply to warn those who are less informed and may fall into it. Scam, scam, scam. They are all the same regardless of language differences. 

拿着药圣的名头来行骗，丢尽华夏子民的脸！

> [arisu](#comment_2_1JvtmeZsTVZXy174Yfk7vLfY7WcR2B7BRV): Usually most of traditional medicines are equal to witchcraft. cuz witchcraft kills people, real medicine usually not.Why?few month ago I had a fever, I came to a hospital in Beijing seeking for treatment. The doctor in there prescribe a kind of injection through IV, made of TCM things, brown potion in an ampoule. After this potion transfuses into my blood, I'm getting some serious allergic reaction. Hives all around my ARM! What if this thing gone further than that? like a shock? Maybe I'm already dead now. [...]

This one ask you to pray and eat printed paper. I suppose nothing detrimental.

> [naturalhealth1](#comment_2_18u8vjc7W4VymgrVPzY2U1zysx75wgxbUe): eat printed paper? Are you kidding me?

Right... apparently placing it under the pillow works better, and counting shit helps

1_1FwxjuAYBy2Y3pCWE16atU2JJfA82Ai3k2.body: just take the 3 .json files in the ZeroNet data folder. #tokens

4_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body:
> [donehrenmann2](#comment_1_1BpNbHgqwXTmdgJar9TbkFpNrD43ztsKWy): Maybe the solution is them understanding they have their own forum ?

Won't help much in ZeroMe though

1_19jkZFyj9bYgLhKxiXjyBHLQsmqN5dUn89.body:
No, hell no. Just mute them. I speak Chinese and I mute those idiots as well. 
The whole project goes pointless if you grant the permission to particular user(s).
As long as no one is spamming new IDs and flooding the board, the mute function should be sufficient.

1_1MCA3S8h1hTysqG9rgVJ5pPQXadQGYPACe.body:
~~and it will be the last time I see you. Good luck.~~
not anymore

1_1HGr5q2yEov55cZf7NE5qBkJvTVSJZVM6g.body: Man... it feels bad to silence these children. Maybe they will grow up better, but meh, nutjobs don't really grow.

2_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: I think the white list system is already implemented in certain region, where one needs to apply for an IP to access Internet.

1_1Mpr8B1fRGBctzf7g9a6X1cb4WbQULH92N.body: In short, don't think about it. Too much data to store for each node.

2_1Hhrr5AbgeyBtF1cnLttTYMZjk5VrRQ5cY.body: PB software section is full of shit these days

> [amsterdam](#comment_3_1Hhrr5AbgeyBtF1cnLttTYMZjk5VrRQ5cY): Agreed. KickassTorrents was great when it was around. Even when I was bored I would just download random shit such as school books and stuff. It seems like there is no replacement.

Right now KAT is essentially TPB in a different skin, same low quality content.

4_1AqXhGEgfmdaUUsvNp3GL9pueqqLbHMkXp.body: I know preconfigured KODI boxes got in trouble, but I don't think IP holders have a reason to attack the platform. It's like selling hard drives full of pirated movies, but no one is banning hard drives. Sites maintained solely by the owner usually don't last long. Community maintained forums get spammed too easily especially on ZeroNet. Ideas?

5_13aB79mzuRLgDYzQthn9wzycjw77WyDXh6.body: I'd like to believe RetroShare has a better mechanism, but it's so damn hard to find a (semi-)public node.

2_1NnThhNZHqenY4WqzEqsqVbveA5pr9vTeF.body: 大禹治水... 现在是往哪都堵
